original_text: “And this shall be the sign for you: this year you shall eat what grows of itself, and in the second year what springs from that. Then in the third year sow and reap, and plant vineyards, and eat their fruit.
korean_text: 왕이여 이것이 왕에게 징조가 되리니 올해는 스스로 난 것을 먹을 것이요 둘째 해에는 또 거기에서 난 것을 먹을 것이요 셋째 해에는 심고 거두며 포도나무를 심고 그 열매를 먹을 것이니이다

sentences.original_text: And this shall be the sign for you:
this year you shall eat what grows of itself,
and in the second year what springs from that.
Then in the third year sow and reap,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 삼 년 차에는 씨를 뿌리고 거두고,
